sections.heading: Short title. This Act shall be known and may be cited as the Illinois Exotic Weeds Act.
sections.text: Short title. This Act shall be known and may be cited as the Illinois Exotic Weeds Act.

sections.heading: Designation of exotic weeds. The Department shall determine the plants that are exotic weeds for the purposes of this Act and shall compile and keep current a list of such exotic weeds, which list shall be published and incorporated in the rules of the Department
sections.text: The Department, by rule, shall exem

sections.heading: Penalty. Violators of this Act shall be guilty of a Class B misdemeanor
sections.text: When the violation is a continuing offense, each day shall be considered a separate violation.
